    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class DraggableCircle
extends Circle
    An instance is a circle that can be dragged by the user on the gui

    • Constructor Detail

      • DraggableCircle

        public DraggableCircle(BoardElement r,
               int x,
               int y,
               int d)
        Constructor: an instance at (x, y) of diameter d that represents r.
        Parameters:
        r - - the game piece that this circle is drawn for
        x - - the starting x coordinate (center point)
        y - - the starting y coordinate (center point)
        d - - the diameter of the circle
